verses.verse: O give thanks <S%H3034><s%> unto Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>; For he is good <S%H2896><s%>; For his lovingkindness <S%H2617><s%> endureth for ever <S%H5769><s%>.
Let the redeemed <S%H1350><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> say <S%H559><s%> so <S%H1350><s%>, Whom he hath redeemed from the hand <S%H3027><s%> of the adversary <S%H6862><s%>,
And gathered <S%H6908><s%> out of the lands <S%H776><s%>, From the east <S%H4217><s%> and from the west <S%H4628><s%>, From the north <S%H6828><s%> and from the south <S%H3220><s%>.
They wandered <S%H8582><s%> in the wilderness <S%H4057><s%> in a desert <S%H3452><s%> way <S%H1870><s%>; They found <S%H4672><s%> no city <S%H5892><s%> of habitation <S%H4186><s%>.
Hungry <S%H7457><s%> and thirsty <S%H6771><s%>, Their soul <S%H5315><s%> fainted in them <S%H5848><s%>.
Then they cried <S%H6817><s%> unto Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> in their trouble <S%H6862><s%>, And he delivered <S%H5337><s%> them out of their distresses <S%H4691><s%>,
He led <S%H1869><s%> them also by a straight <S%H3477><s%> way <S%H1870><s%>, That they might go <S%H3212><s%> to a city <S%H5892><s%> of habitation <S%H4186><s%>.
Oh that men would praise <S%H3034><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> for his lovingkindness <S%H2617><s%>, And for his wonderful works <S%H6381><s%> to the children <S%H1121><s%> of men <S%H120><s%>!
For he satisfieth <S%H7646><s%> the longing <S%H8264><s%> soul <S%H5315><s%>, And the hungry <S%H7457><s%> soul <S%H5315><s%> he filleth <S%H4390><s%> with good <S%H2896><s%>.
Such as sat <S%H3427><s%> in darkness <S%H2822><s%> and in the shadow of death <S%H6757><s%>, Being bound <S%H615><s%> in affliction <S%H6040><s%> and iron <S%H1270><s%>,
Because they rebelled <S%H4784><s%> against the words <S%H561><s%> of God <S%H410><s%>, And contemned <S%H5006><s%> the counsel <S%H6098><s%> of the Most High <S%H5945><s%>:
Therefore he brought down <S%H3665><s%> their heart <S%H3820><s%> with labor <S%H5999><s%>; They fell down <S%H3782><s%>, and there was none to help <S%H5826><s%>.
Then they cried <S%H2199><s%> unto Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> in their trouble <S%H6862><s%>, And he saved <S%H3467><s%> them out of their distresses <S%H4691><s%>.
He brought them out <S%H3318><s%> of darkness <S%H2822><s%> and the shadow of death <S%H6757><s%>, And brake <S%H5423><s%> their bonds <S%H4147><s%> in sunder <S%H5423><s%>.
Oh that men would praise <S%H3034><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> for his lovingkindness <S%H2617><s%>, And for his wonderful works <S%H6381><s%> to the children <S%H1121><s%> of men <S%H120><s%>!
For he hath broken <S%H7665><s%> the gates <S%H1817><s%> of brass <S%H5178><s%>, And cut <S%H1438><s%> the bars <S%H1280><s%> of iron <S%H1270><s%> in sunder <S%H1438><s%>.
Fools <S%H191><s%> because <S%H1870><s%> of their transgression <S%H6588><s%>, And because of their iniquities <S%H5771><s%>, are afflicted <S%H6031><s%>.
Their soul <S%H5315><s%> abhorreth <S%H8581><s%> all manner of food <S%H400><s%>; And they draw near <S%H5060><s%> unto the gates <S%H8179><s%> of death <S%H4194><s%>.
Then they cry <S%H2199><s%> unto Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> in their trouble <S%H6862><s%>, And he saveth <S%H3467><s%> them out of their distresses <S%H4691><s%>.
He sendeth <S%H7971><s%> his word <S%H1697><s%>, and healeth <S%H7495><s%> them <S%H4422><s%>, And delivereth them from their destructions <S%H7825><s%>.
Oh that men would praise <S%H3034><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> for his lovingkindness <S%H2617><s%>, And for his wonderful works <S%H6381><s%> to the children <S%H1121><s%> of men <S%H120><s%>!
And let them offer the sacrifices <S%H2077><s%> of thanksgiving <S%H8426><s%>, And declare <S%H5608><s%> his works <S%H4639><s%> with singing <S%H7440><s%>.
They that go down <S%H3381><s%> to the sea <S%H3220><s%> in ships <S%H591><s%>, That do <S%H6213><s%> business <S%H4399><s%> in great <S%H7227><s%> waters <S%H4325><s%>;
These see <S%H7200><s%> the works <S%H4639><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, And his wonders <S%H6381><s%> in the deep <S%H4688><s%>.
For he commandeth <S%H559><s%>, and raiseth <S%H5975><s%> the stormy <S%H5591><s%> wind <S%H7307><s%>, Which lifteth up <S%H7311><s%> the waves thereof <S%H1530><s%>.

They mount up <S%H5927><s%> to the heavens <S%H8064><s%>, they go down <S%H3381><s%> again to the depths <S%H8415><s%>: Their soul <S%H5315><s%> melteth <S%H4127><s%> away because of trouble <S%H7451><s%>.
They reel to and fro <S%H2287><s%>, and stagger <S%H5128><s%> like a drunken man <S%H7910><s%>, And are at their wits <S%H2451><s%>' end <S%H1104><s%>.
Then they cry <S%H6817><s%> unto Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> in their trouble <S%H6862><s%>, And he bringeth them out <S%H3318><s%> of their distresses <S%H4691><s%>.
He maketh <S%H6965><s%> the storm <S%H5591><s%> a calm <S%H1827><s%>, So that the waves <S%H1530><s%> thereof are still <S%H2814><s%>.
Then are they glad <S%H8055><s%> because they are quiet <S%H8367><s%>; So he bringeth <S%H5148><s%> them unto their desired <S%H2656><s%> haven <S%H4231><s%>.
Oh that men would praise <S%H3034><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> for his lovingkindness <S%H2617><s%>, And for his wonderful works <S%H6381><s%> to the children <S%H1121><s%> of men <S%H120><s%>!
Let them exalt <S%H7311><s%> him also in the assembly <S%H6951><s%> of the people <S%H5971><s%>, And praise <S%H1984><s%> him in the seat <S%H4186><s%> of the elders <S%H2205><s%>.
He turneth <S%H7760><s%> rivers <S%H5104><s%> into a wilderness <S%H4057><s%>, And watersprings <S%H4325><s%> into a thirsty ground <S%H6774><s%>;
A fruitful <S%H6529><s%> land <S%H776><s%> into a salt <S%H4420><s%> desert <S%H7451><s%>, For the wickedness of them that dwell therein <S%H3427><s%>.
He turneth <S%H7760><s%> a wilderness <S%H4057><s%> into a pool <S%H98><s%> of water <S%H4325><s%>, And a dry <S%H6723><s%> land <S%H776><s%> into watersprings <S%H4325><s%>.
And there he maketh the hungry <S%H7457><s%> to dwell <S%H3427><s%>, That they may prepare <S%H3559><s%> a city <S%H5892><s%> of habitation <S%H4186><s%>,
And sow <S%H2232><s%> fields <S%H7704><s%>, and plant <S%H5193><s%> vineyards <S%H3754><s%>, And get <S%H6213><s%> them fruits <S%H6529><s%> of increase <S%H8393><s%>.
He blesseth <S%H1288><s%> them also <S%H7235><s%>, so that they are multiplied greatly <S%H3966><s%>; And he suffereth <S%H4591><s%> not their cattle <S%H929><s%> to decrease <S%H4591><s%>.
Again <S%H4591><s%>, they are diminished and bowed down <S%H7817><s%> Through oppression <S%H6115><s%>, trouble <S%H7451><s%>, and sorrow <S%H3015><s%>.
He poureth <S%H8210><s%> contempt <S%H937><s%> upon princes <S%H5081><s%>, And causeth them to wander <S%H8582><s%> in the waste <S%H8414><s%>, where there is no way <S%H1870><s%>.
Yet setteth he the needy <S%H34><s%> on high <S%H7682><s%> from affliction <S%H6040><s%>, And maketh <S%H7760><s%> him families <S%H4940><s%> like a flock <S%H6629><s%>.
The upright <S%H3477><s%> shall see <S%H7200><s%> it <S%H8055><s%>, and be glad; And all iniquity <S%H5766><s%> shall stop <S%H7092><s%> her mouth <S%H6310><s%>.
Whoso is wise <S%H2450><s%> will give heed <S%H8104><s%> to these things <S%H995><s%>; And they will consider the lovingkindnesses <S%H2617><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>.
